home.hero_title: Take Control of Your Medication Journey
home.hero_subtitle: Track, manage, and stay on top of your medications with our comprehensive medication adherence system.
home.feature_medication_desc: Easily track and manage all your medications in one place with detailed information and scheduling.
home.feature_reminders_desc: Never miss a dose with customizable reminders and notifications tailored to your schedule.
home.feature_analytics_desc: Track your progress and identify patterns with detailed adherence reports and insights.
home.feature_secure_desc: Your health information is protected with industry-standard security and encryption.
home.cta_subtitle: Join thousands of users who are managing their medications effectively.
